ygData.messageBody:
> > 1. Is the RTS the best 2HB weapon one can get?? Or are there more? sounds

> No, best 2HB shld be staff of writhing? Give 11 dam and pretty cool stats

It might be a good idea to start practicing the 1H skills as well,
especially 1H staff...

It seems there are a lot of cool items for casters that must be held
in the hand, which precludes 2-handed weapons.

I have a RTS which I bought for 15 pp, but still keep my GS Fang
for practice... thinking of practicing with cracked staff also.

I WANT A SKULL OF JHEN'TRA!!!!
